*sigh*

You probably don't hate us, most likely, you are quite frustrated 
with people not understanding what you're doing. When Zardus 
deleted some of your polls, it probably added to the sense of being 
ignored. =)

lol, we cannot forget Rhesus, we never knew him. He only acts and 
thinks in your mind. And remember to keep the OOC posts to a 
minimum. there have been about 650 posts in the last 4-5 days... 
likely, 400+ were OOC's. =)

Also, do you have an email address that we can contact you at? i 
tried dewboy30816@..., and came up with mail system 
error - returned mail, indicating that the address is over full or 
something. =)


On 22 Jul 2001, at 0:28, dewboy30816@... wrote:

>  O.k. I admit that I had some rude polls, but thats no reason for
> everyone to gang up on me and say Mustex had such a bad idea of fusing
> sparks(and legendarynemisis is crazy if he thinks Rhesus is going to
> take on Megaton).
